name: Random Track Racing
description:
A race where the main enemy is the track! 

How long can you stay on the track?

Prototype #4 / 11

This game is one of the prototypes made in a week as part of the "souls-like prototyping" challenge.

  • Genre: racing
  • Unusual game mechanics:  real-time track generation

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • SPACE - Hand break
  • L.SHIFT - Speed boost
  • R - Reset car
  • TAB - Switch camera
